column4: To reach a sustainable future, every company must ensure that the energy it consumes comes from renewable sources: solar, wind, ocean, hydropower, geothermal resources and biomass.
This includes both electricity and heating it purchases from third parties, as well as any electricity or heating it generates itself.
Did the company use any energy during the reporting period?
Based on the description above, please indicate whether this topic applied to the company during the reporting period.
Please provide a brief description of why this goal did not apply to the company during the reporting period.
Does the company measure / monitor the amount of energy it uses?
Please select the option below that best describes the degree to which the company tracked this information during the reporting period.
Company does not have access to / does not track the energy usage data from its operations
column5: Company has access to / tracks the energy usage data for part of its operations
column6: Company has access to and tracks energy usage data for all or substantially all of its operations (90%+)

column4: Does the company measure / monitor the type of energy it uses, including whether it comes from renewable sources?
Please select the option below that best describes the degree to which the company tracked this information during the reporting period.
Company does not know / does not track the sources of energy it consumes and how it's generated
column5: Company knows / tracks the sources of energy it consumes and how it's generated across part of its operations
column6: Company knows and tracks the sources of energy it consumes and how it's generated across all or substantially all of its operations (90%+)
